The declaration of Mr. Patrik Crawfurd his returne from poperie to the true religion, which is according to the Word of God, in holie Scripture Crawfurd, Patrick.
[6], 59, [1] p.
Printed by Iohn Wreittoun, Edinburgh : Anno Dom. 1627.
Some copies have an extra leaf with Latin verse addressed to the author by T. Crawfurd--STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
